Module fr.cyu
Package C.Languages

Class Language

  • java.lang.Object
    • C.Languages.Language
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CLanguage, JavaLanguage, JsLanguage, PHPLanguage, PythonLanguage
    public class Language
extends java.lang.Object
    The Language class provides methods to execute programs and handle input/output streams. This class is intended to be extended by specific language implementations.

      Language()

      Executes a program with a given parameter.

      Executes a program with input entries.

      Writes input data to the standard input of a process.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public boolean execute​(java.lang.String executablePath)
        Executes a program.
        Parameters:
        executablePath - the path to the executable file.
        Returns:
        false by default, should be overridden by subclasses.

      • execute

        public java.lang.String[] execute​(java.lang.String executablePath,
                                  java.lang.String[] entries)
                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                  java.lang.InterruptedException
        Executes a program with input entries.
        Parameters:
        executablePath - the path to the executable file.
        entries - the input entries for the executable.
        Returns:
        the input entries by default, should be overridden by subclasses.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the execution process.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the execution process is interrupted.

      • readStdin

        public void readStdin​(java.lang.Process process,
                      java.lang.String[] entryData)
               throws java.io.IOException,
                      java.lang.InterruptedException
        Writes input data to the standard input of a process.
        Parameters:
        process - the process to which input data is written.
        entryData - the input data to write to the process.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the writing process.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the writing process is interrupted.

      • readStdout

        public java.lang.String[] readStdout​(java.lang.Process process)
        Reads the standard output of a process.
        Parameters:
        process - the process from which to read the output.
        Returns:
        the output of the process as an array of Strings, or null if an error occurs.

      • checkLanguage

        public boolean checkLanguage​(java.lang.StringBuilder program)
        Checks if the given program code is written in the specific language.
        Parameters:
        program - the program code to check.
        Returns:
        false by default, should be overridden by subclasses.

      • execute

        public java.lang.String[] execute​(java.lang.String genExoFile,
                                  int i)
                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                  java.lang.InterruptedException
        Executes a program with a given parameter.
        Parameters:
        genExoFile - the path to the executable file.
        i - the parameter to pass to the executable.
        Returns:
        an array containing a single "0" by default, should be overridden by subclasses.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the execution process.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the execution process is interrupted.
